kv17.6:5.4: Nanu saṃgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti?
kv17.6:5.6: Hañci saṃgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.6:6.4: Nanu cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatāti?
kv17.6:6.6: Hañci cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatā, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.6:7.4: Nanu atthi keci saṃghassa dānaṃ dentīti?
kv17.6:7.6: Hañci atthi keci saṃghassa dānaṃ denti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.6:7.8: Nanu atthi keci saṃghassa cīvaraṃ denti … pe …
kv17.6:7.18: Hañci atthi keci saṃghassa pānīyaṃ denti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.6:12.1: Na vattabbaṃ saṃgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā niṭṭhitā.
